description.raw:
I needed ground truth pose information from gazebo, so I brought the gazebo_ros_p3d plugin to be built with the other ROS plugins in drcsim. I also added the plugin to the SDF file of the robot, but I'm not sure if that's something you'll also want.

This is a duplicate of pull request #44, but it was accepted into the wrong branch. 

Note the Diff's are generating changes to files that I did not make changes to. I'm not exactly sure how to deal with this, as I'm relatively new to using Mercurial & bitbucket.
